snippet: Prosecutors in Moscow filed formal charges against the husband of a protest leader, stirring concerns of a campaign of political revenge against antigovernment activists.
abstract: Russian prosecutors file formal charges against embattled businessman Aleksei Kozlov, husband of protest leader Olga Romanova, stirring concerns of a campaign of political revenge against antigovernment activists.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in Moscow filed formal charges against the husband of a protest leader, stirring concerns of a campaign of political revenge against antigovernment activists.

headline.seo: Russian Activists See Political Reprisal in Court Case
headline.main: Russian Activists See Political Reprisal in Court Case
headline.print_headline: Court Case In Moscow Raises Fears Of Reprisal
